dt: {bc}the chance that a given event will occur
{bc}the ratio of the number of outcomes in an exhaustive set of equally likely outcomes that produce a given event to the total number of possible outcomes
{bc}a branch of mathematics concerned with the study of {a_link|probabilities}
{bc}something (such as an event or circumstance) that is probable
{bc}a logical relation between statements such that evidence confirming one confirms the other to some degree

shortdef: the chance that a given event will occur
the ratio of the number of outcomes in an exhaustive set of equally likely outcomes that produce a given event to the total number of possible outcomes
a branch of mathematics concerned with the study of probabilities

dt: {bc}the probability that a given event will occur if it is certain that another event has taken place or will take place

shortdef: the probability that a given event will occur if it is certain that another event has taken place or will take place
